text:
who wanna test the hottest JSON formatter for HS dev. info?
<https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/tree/json-formatter>
is it in the official extension or the dev version?
I would love to test the JSON formatter
it’s in the specific branch Gonzalo posted, it’s still not quite ready  to merge into the beta versiono

It functions, there’s a couple things we need to work out - it might require permissions that we don’t want to require, the rest is minor - just kinda performancy. <@U7ADCU3BM> we might be able to make it an optional permission, that would be ideal, but documentation for doing a content script that way isn’t great.

As Jon said, we didn't included there yet because we want to change the permissions required (full access because it isn't based on one domain only). But in the meantime I would like if some of you test it so we can be sure that it works properly or fix it and then just push to the main branch

As of yesterday we hit 197 users, I'm assuming based on the ongoing trend we broke 200 users. That means we've hit 1/3 the population of the developer slack(this doesn't mean 1/3 of the people in the slack, it is a comparison 200 vs the 620 last I checked
Great work guys, really, this whole project has become something to be really proud of.
Funny/sad thing is I'm confident I've personally said that
Whenever things get crazy I tend to say "this is like camping ..." "What!?" "It's in-tents" #levelingUpMyDadJokeGame #dontEvenHaveKidsYet
think i found one of the bigger performance things with the formatter. I’ll see if I can fix it.

hmm nevermind though, don’t think I can fix it. 
The issue I see is removing elements from the dom and then inserting new ones is kinda taxing so the better way to do it would be to modify the existing content of the page without removing the whole giant text block. and without adding it all back, my javascript kungfu isn’t quite good enough to figure out how to do that.

I had a friend who hated it when people said “Fo sho”, as he should. So to bother him my friends and I would always say “Foooo Shoooo” to him. We said it so much that it became part of normal speech for us. And now we have taken our inside joke outside and people are like, “That guy is always saying ‘fo sho’ like a complete ass.”
